intension: Create a poster advertising a breakfast meal at Art's Cafe, featuring tasty cheese pancakes with blueberries and honey. The meal is only available from 8-12 am on Sundays throughout the summer.
globalcaption: The image features a white plate filled with a delicious assortment of food. The plate is topped with blueberries, strawberries, and pancakes, creating a colorful and appetizing presentation. The blueberries are scattered across the plate, with some placed closer to the center and others near the edges. The strawberries are positioned towards the left side of the plate, adding a pop of red to the dish. The pancakes are placed in the background, providing a contrasting element to the vibrant fruits.
keywords: breakfast, dessert, food, meal, pancakes, tasty, cheese, blueberries, honey, poster

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white plate filled with a delicious assortment of food. The plate is topped with blueberries, strawberries, and pancakes, creating a colorful and appetizing presentation. The blueberries are scattered across the plate, with some placed closer to the edge and others more towards the center. The strawberries are positioned in the middle of the plate, adding a pop of red to the dish. The pancakes are placed around the plate, with some overlapping the strawberries and others surrounding the blueberries. The combination of these elements creates a visually appealing and mouth-watering
